Description_lang: $?a443534[During battle, open the Tome and begin reading through "The $s1 Verses of Inner Radiance" increasing your Critical Strike by $s2 and granting your attacks a chance to inflict an additional $s3 Radiant damage.][During battle, open the Tome and begin reading through "The $s1 Verses of Inner Resilience" increasing your armor by $s4 and granting your attacks a chance to invoke a ward which absorbs $s5 Magic damage.] When finished, sift through the passages to another chapter.Use: Zealously sift through the passages to another chapter and read with increased Radiance.
